disable_default_nav.label: Disable default navigation
disable_default_nav.comment: If using EM MegaMenuPro, default catalog navigation should be disabled

freezed_top_menu.label: Freezed Top Menu
freezed_top_menu.comment: Make the menu on top while scrolling

disable_frontend_variation.label: Disable Variation block on frontend
disable_frontend_variation.comment: Display the variation module on frontend. For theme demonstration purpose.

disable_footer_links.label: Remove footer links
disable_footer_links.comment:
Remove the default Magento footer links: Site Map, Search Terms, Advanced Search, Orders and Returns, Contact Us
You can add your own footer links by create a static block, and insert new widget instance GALA Static Block on to the Footer position.

disable_social.label: Disable Block Social On Details page

google_fonts.label: Import Google Fonts
google_fonts.comment: Select which google fonts should be imported to your site. Hold SHIFT + left click a font to multiple select.

general_font.label: General Font
general_font.comment:
Font for body, content, text...
Default: normal 12px/1.5 "Helvetica Neue", Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

h1_font.label: H1 Font
h1_font.comment:
Font of H1 element and other similar h1 heading.
Default: 500 22px/1.25 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h2_font.label: H2 Font
h2_font.comment:
Font of H2 element and other similar h2 heading.
Default: 500 20px/1.25 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h3_font.label: H3 Font
h3_font.comment:
Font of H3 element and other similar h3 heading.
Default: 500 18px/1.25 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h4_font.label: H4 Font
h4_font.comment:
Font of H4 element and other similar h4 heading.
Default: 500 16px/1.35 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h5_font.label: H5 Font
h5_font.comment:
Font of H5 element and other similar h5 heading.
Default: 500 14px/1.35 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

h6_font.label: H6 Font
h6_font.comment:
Font of H6 element and other similar h6 heading.
Default: 500 12px/1.55 "Droid Sans", "Helvetica Neue", helvetica,arial,sans-serif

additional_css_file.label: Additional CSS File(s)
additional_css_file.comment:
Add custom css file name.
File must locate in the same folder of theme.css (skin/frontend/galababystyle/default/css/). Multiple files separated by a comma (,).
File custom1.css and custom2.css are 2 examples provided in this theme. You can create your own file as well.
E.g.: custom1.css
E.g.: custom1.css,custom1plus.css

custom_css.label: Your Custom CSS
custom_css.comment: Add your custom CSS in addition to the Addition CSS File

head_bg_file.label: Upload Header Background Image
head_bg_file.comment: Upload your custom header background image instead of selecting above background pattern

head_bg_position.label: Header Background Position
head_bg_position.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

head_bg_repeat.label: Header Background Repeat
head_bg_repeat.comment:
Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit
Default: repeat

bd_bg_file.label: Upload Body Background Image
bd_bg_file.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background pattern

bd_bg_position.label: Body Background Position
bd_bg_position.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

bd_bg_repeat.label: Body Background Repeat
bd_bg_repeat.comment:
Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit
Default: repeat

bd_text_color.label: Body Text Color
bd_text_color.comment:
Default color used in product name...
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #343434

bd_text2_color.label: Body Text 2 Color
bd_text2_color.comment:
Default color used in normal text...
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #666666

bd_text3_color.label: Body Text 3 Color
bd_text3_color.comment:
Default color used in price, title block...
Syntax: #number or rgba(...)
Default: #389be0

foot_bg_file.label: Upload Footer Background Image
foot_bg_file.comment: Upload your custom page background image instead of selecting above background pattern

foot_bg_position.label: Footer Background Position
foot_bg_position.comment:
Property Values: left top, left center, left bottom,right top, right center, right bottom,center top,center center,center bottom,x% y%, xpos ypos, inherit
Default: 0 0

foot_bg_repeat.label: Footer Background Repeat
foot_bg_repeat.comment:
Property Values: repeat, repeat-x, repeat-y, no-repeat, inherit
Default: repeat

alt_img.label: Alternative image
alt_img.comment: Image should be displayed when hover to the thumbnail image.

alt_img.label: Alternative image
alt_img.comment: Image should be displayed when hover to the thumbnail image.

viewmode.label: View mode
viewmode.comment: Set view mode in detail page: cloudzoom, lightbox, default

use_tabs.label: Enable Tabs
use_tabs.comment: Use tabs to display product collaterals

auto_close.label: Auto close
auto_close.comment: Specify the second for ajax cart to auto-close.
